account_id.description: This is generated by Canopy. A unique ID for the account.

account_status.description: The Status of the Account. Active upon account creation.

account_status_subtype.description: The subtype of the Status of the Account. Null upon account creation.

effective_at.description: The `Date-Time` that this account became/becomes active.

created_at.description: The `Date-Time` which the account was created in the API.

product.description: The product associated with the account

external_account_ids.description: An Array of External Account IDs. These should be used to connect accounts created in Canopy to Users in your system and any connected external systems.

total_balance.description: The total balance (in cents) associated with the account.

principal_balance_cents.description: The total amount (in cents) associated with the account's principal balance.

total_payments_to_date.description: The sum of payments to date (in cents) associated with the account.

total_interest_paid_to_date.description: The sum of interest payments to date (in cents) associated with the account.

payoff_date.description: The `Date-Time` that this account is scheduled to make its final payment.

payment_detail.description: Payment details for the account holder

due_date.description: The `Date-Time` that this account's next due date is due'.

total_due_cents.description: The total amount due for the account.

current_due_cents.description: The current due amount for the account.

past_due_cents.description: The past due amount for the account.

credit_limit_cents.description: For credit products, the total Amount (in cents) that this account can borrow. This field is not necessary for installment products.

rate.description: The percentage interest applied to the account (i.e. 6.2 means 6.2%)

loan_amount.description: For installment loans, the loan amount for the account.

offer.description: For installment loans, the offer applied to this account. This field is not necessary for credit products.

available_credit_balance.description: The total available credit balance (in cents) for the account.

due.description: A breakdown of payments due by bucket
